statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customer_profiles WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customer_profiles WHERE facial_recognition_data IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customer_profiles WHERE LENGTH(name) > 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND JSON_LENGTH(facial_recognition_data) > 0;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customer_profiles WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, payment_date FROM customers c JOIN payments p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id ORDER BY payment_date;
SELECT first_name, last_name, amount FROM customers c JOIN payments p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 2000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'pending';
SELECT payment_method, transaction_id FROM payments WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, facial_recognition_data FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, payment_status FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_history FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, method_type FROM payment_methods WHERE card_number LIKE '5%';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT customer_name, payment_history FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, payment_methods.method_type FROM customer_profiles JOIN payment_methods ON customer_profiles.customer_id = payment_methods.customer_id WHERE payment_methods.method_type = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT facial_id, facial_data FROM facial_recognition WHERE facial_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_time FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status = 'Success' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, facial_recognition_data FROM biometric_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM customer_profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, facial_recognition_data FROM customer_profiles WHERE facial_recognition_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT t.transaction_id, p.amount, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t JOIN payments p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id WHERE p.amount < 5000 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
